means: 笨手笨脚地做，拙劣地工作

sentence.Network_en: If you bungle a job, you must do it again!
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你把一件事搞糟了, 你得重做!

sentence.Network_en: That last stupid bungle of his is the end.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那最后一次愚蠢的错误使我再也无法容忍了.

sentence.Network_en: Don't let him mend your bike. He's sure to bungle the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 别让他修理你的自行车. 他肯定会弄得一团糟的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 虞字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 企望;期待〖 hope;expect〗 贻误;欺诈〖 bungle;cheat〗 惊〖 start;befrightened〗.
IE用户智商低？(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... colossal 巨大的 bungle 粗制滥造 hypothesis 假说.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... bog down 使……陷入困境 bungle 搞坏，贻误 carve up 瓜分.
何兆熊综合教程B6U15Glossary - 豆丁网 ... error n. 错误,过失 bungle v. 拙劣地工作,粗率地做 goof n. 愚蠢的人,愚蠢的错误.

list.abs: The electrician bungled the wiring job ., 电工笨拙地做接线工作.

while the world looked on , transfixed , the terrorists held 11 Israeli athletes hostage for 21 tense hours until political bungling resulted in a deadly firefight at a local airport .恐怖分子劫特了11名以色列运动员作为人质，时间长达21小时，由于政治谈判的最终失败，在当地的一个机场爆发了一场生死枪战，全世界上民眼睁睁地看着
their pay was late because of a computer bungle .由于计算机出错，他们的工资晚发了。
bungler 笨蛋bungling fool 笨拙的傻瓜confound 可恶，活该，去死（比damn轻的骂语）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: of unknown origin; compare with bumble

entry.def: If you bungle something, you fail to do it properly, because you make mistakes or are clumsy.

example.ex: Two prisoners bungled an escape bid after running either side of a lamp-post while handcuffed.
example.tran: 两名被手铐铐在一起的囚犯试图逃跑时分别往电灯杆两边跑，结果没逃掉。

example.ex: ...the FBI's bungled attempt to end the 51 day siege.
example.tran: 联邦调查局为结束持续51天的围困进行的糟糕尝试

means.word_mean: 1. make a mess of, destroy or ruin;

sentences.sentence: "I botched the dinner and we had to eat out"
"the pianist screwed up the difficult passage in the second movement"

means.word_mean: 2. spoil by behaving clumsily or foolishly;

auth_sentence.content: How'd he bungle it when he killed himself?
auth_sentence.res_content: How'd he bungle it when he killed himself?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How'd he bungle it when he killed himself?

auth_sentence.content: Care to avoid bungle by haste and lack of strategy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Care to avoid bungle by haste and lack of strategy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Care to avoid bungle by haste and lack of strategy.

auth_sentence.content: Through some bungle the courier...had missed them on the road.
auth_sentence.res_content: Through some bungle the courier...had missed them on the road.

搞糟了的事情; 失误

sentences.en: Their pay was late because of a computer bungle.
sentences.cn: 他们的工资晚发了，是由于计算机出错。
